title: The Beginning of the Quest
pathway: You wake up in a bustling medieval town square.
description: The town of Eldor rests in the shadow of the Dragonspire Mountains. The chatter of merchants fills the air as you hear a commotion near the town gates.

options.name: Investigate the commotion
options.description: Approach the gates to see what the noise is about.

options.name: Visit the blacksmith
options.description: Head to the blacksmith to purchase equipment.

title: The Town Gates
pathway: You find a group of guards arguing with a cloaked figure.
description: The guards accuse the cloaked figure of being a spy for the orc clans. The figure denies this, offering a glowing amulet as proof of their innocence.

options.name: Intervene and support the cloaked figure
options.description: Stand up for the cloaked figure and challenge the guards.

options.name: Side with the guards
options.description: Help the guards arrest the cloaked figure.

title: The Blacksmith's Forge
pathway: You enter the blacksmith's forge, where the heat is almost unbearable.
description: The blacksmith offers you a choice of weapons, each with unique properties.

items.name: Iron Longsword
items.description: A sturdy blade for close combat.

items.name: Light Crossbow
items.description: A ranged weapon for precision strikes.

options.name: Purchase the Iron Longsword
options.description: Buy the longsword for 20 gold coins.

collectedItems.name: Iron Longsword
collectedItems.description: A sturdy blade for close combat.

options.name: Purchase the Light Crossbow
options.description: Buy the crossbow for 15 gold coins.

collectedItems.name: Light Crossbow
collectedItems.description: A ranged weapon for precision strikes.

title: Defending the Stranger
description: The guards are unwilling to back down and draw their swords, initiating combat.

enemies.name: Town Guard

weapons.name: Shortsword
weapons.description: A standard issue weapon for the town guards.

enemies.description: A determined guard wielding a shortsword.

limitation: The battle ends when the guards surrender or are defeated.

options.name: Continue the fight
options.description: Press the attack until the guards yield.

options.name: Negotiate a truce
options.description: Convince the guards to let the stranger go.

title: Arresting the Stranger
description: The cloaked figure glares at you as they are taken into custody. One of the guards offers you a reward for your loyalty.

items.name: Gold Pouch
items.description: A hefty pouch of 50 gold coins.

options.name: Refuse the reward
options.description: Decline the gold and ask for information instead.
